title: BetKing.io
author: BetKing.io
created_time: September 09, 2023, 06:33:52 PMLast edit: September 22, 2023, 07:59:00 AM by BetKing.io
content: This thread is for any investors who purchased BKB during the ICO in 2017 that may not be in the Telegram group or receive emails.Quick history:We launched an ICO in 2017 that raised $6 million.When we closed the last time, investors still held over $2 million worth of tokens that we were trying to refund but couldn't due to the site not able to turn a profit.The other investors had sold their tokens in the old buy back program (some made a profit) or were refunded in other ways since then.We are now in a better place to start refunding the remaining token holders.The https://betking.io website went live about 6 weeks ago with the purpose of being a convenient place for old token holders to receive refunds.You can read about the refund process here https://betking.io/token At this time there is no way for any players to deposit and play.We don't have time to run BetKing as a casino at this time. We may open to deposits and add extra games in future if we can find someone to run and market the site.All BKB holders who had an account and tokens on site after 2019 (after the last software update) are automatically receiving refunds from the pool. If you have tokens in your own wallet (not on an exchange) or have lost access to your account please email support@betking.io for help.Any posts that are clearly signature spam or that are just attacking without reading the OP will be deleted.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Is the old account of Betking is still functional because I can’t login my old account while I have the confirmation email during my registration. I store most of my BKB token on trezor that I purchased on the built-in exchange after the ICO. Am I still eligible for the refund even though I move my tokens out of the casino?Nevermind, will contact via email. ThanksI will update here once I get in touch with the support via email. I hope that I can still refund my 7K BKB tokens. Finger crossed here!

comments.author: BetKing.io
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on September 09, 2023, 06:42:37 PMIs the old account of Betking is still functional because I can’t login my old account while I have the confirmation email during my registration. I store most of my BKB token on trezor that I purchased on the built-in exchange after the ICO. Am I still eligible for the refund even though I move my tokens out of the casino?Nevermind, will contact via email. ThanksHi, Yes you would be. It's likely that your account was not imported in to the new version in 2019 if it had no balance on site.If you forward the confirmation email to support@betking.io we can help recover.

comments.body: Quote from: BetKing.io on September 09, 2023, 06:48:56 PMQuote from: Eternad on September 09, 2023, 06:42:37 PMIs the old account of Betking is still functional because I can’t login my old account while I have the confirmation email during my registration. It's likely that your account was not imported in to the new version in 2019 if it had no balance on site.If you forward the confirmation email to support@betking.io we can help recover.I can’t login my account totally despite I have my confirmation email from my registration way back 2017. Reset password is not working to recover my account. I just hope that I will have a chance to access it again and refund both my tokens in Trezor and casino.I’m glad that you are committed to pay back all the investors that trust your casino before. One question, is the 0.093$ per BKB tokens is the refund token rate? This is nice if this the refund rate.

comments.author: BetKing.io
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on September 09, 2023, 06:54:17 PMQuote from: BetKing.io on September 09, 2023, 06:48:56 PMQuote from: Eternad on September 09, 2023, 06:42:37 PMIs the old account of Betking is still functional because I can’t login my old account while I have the confirmation email during my registration. Reset password is not working to recover my account. I just hope that I will have a chance to access it again and refund both my tokens in Trezor and casino.I’m glad that you are committed to pay back all the investors that trust your casino before. One question, is the 0.093$ per BKB tokens is the refund token rate? This is nice if this the refund rate.If you had an account in 2017 but didn't have a balance in your account in 2019 your old account will not work. You would need to make a new one and then prove ownership of tokens.The rate is $0.09128 yes, that was the price of the token after the ICO ended. Most investors bought the tokens cheaper in the earlier stages of the ICO.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: You can move this thread to the altcoin announcement section since it's purely related to token sale, then alternatively I would suggest you should look at your ICO thread then send them pm I think those who participated will receive the messages if at all there is a thread which you created then.I believe by now many would had forgotten about this project or lost access but with pm to those who participated they will remember and respond to you.Sorry if my reply got you offended..

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: SmartGold01 on September 10, 2023, 06:21:51 AMYou can move this thread to the altcoin announcement section since it's purely related to token sale, then alternatively I would suggest you should look at your ICO thread then send them pm I think those who participated will receive the messages if at all there is a thread which you created then.Betking is a Bitcoin casino and this topic is not about ICO/Altcoin alone because they are not selling tokens anymore. They are refunding users of this casino that affected when they are out of business which happened that involved their token but they are Bitcoin casino. It’s like the discussion of BFG tokens on Betfury Ann Gambling board.They will get more visibility to all the casino player victims sake here on gambling board compared to altcoin board since players here doesn’t visit that board often. This thread is for affected players/investors of this casino like me. You can just skip this thread if you are not one of the victim.Quote from: SmartGold01 on September 10, 2023, 06:21:51 AMI believe by now many would had forgotten about this project or lost access but with pm to those who participated they will remember and respond to you.This is not a good solution because they don’t have list of investors. ICO doesn’t have KYC during that time and anyone can purchase tokens anonymously using a thrash email. Maybe new member will only fogot this project but those who invest and play here will never forget since Betking is popular brand that time or else their trust score will not be bombarded by bunch of negative trust from multiple DT. Typically, Scam mediocre casino only receive 1-2 neg rrust when they become scam.   I will update my post here if I manage to get a refund. Dean promised me for a refund solution next week. Let's see.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on September 10, 2023, 11:16:34 AMI will update my post here if I manage to get a refund. Dean promised me for a refund solution next week. Let's see. I became aware of Betking a few years after it became a scam, I'm sure you're going to get your refund, that's the purpose of this thread I wonder do they have a plan to reopen in the future, They mentioned at this time in their post that is why they are refunding and trying to clean their name QuoteAt this time there is no way for any players to deposit and play.We don't have time to run BetKing as a casino at this time.The casino industry is very robust new casinos are being launched If ever will they have a chance to get back after this issue, hopefully, investors will see this thread and get a chance to get their refund, after a very long time.

comments.author: WingDing55
comments.body: Hi, I was one of the investors in the Betking ICO in 2017, possibly even one of the largest investors at the time. There have been many years of discussion about how things went wrong and what happened to the site. I, like many people, have never known for sure what happened but I can confirm that I've started to see refunds for my tokens and this is the first time since the casino failure years ago that I had any refund. In about 3 months I've gotten back about 2% of my investment, but it's real money successfully withdrawn from the site. It's a hopeful sign because if I was made whole it would be absolutely life changing.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on September 11, 2023, 05:35:06 AMQuote from: Eternad on September 10, 2023, 11:16:34 AMI will update my post here if I manage to get a refund. Dean promised me for a refund solution next week. Let's see. I became aware of Betking a few years after it became a scam, I'm sure you're going to get your refund, that's the purpose of this thread I wonder do they have a plan to reopen in the future, They mentioned at this time in their post that is why they are refunding and trying to clean their name I think they have plan to reopen or else they will not bother fixing their reputation that is tainted for many years. I’m already on the process of refund since Dean already ask my wallet address to receive the funds yesterday although he become inactive after our last conversation. Still understandable since today is weekends and he fulfilled his promise that he will contact me yesterday. I'm positive that this refund will be successful.Quote from: WingDing55 on September 17, 2023, 11:03:58 AMHi, I was one of the investors in the Betking ICO in 2017, possibly even one of the largest investors at the time. There have been many years of discussion about how things went wrong and what happened to the site. I, like many people, have never known for sure what happened but I can confirm that I've started to see refunds for my tokens and this is the first time since the casino failure years ago that I had any refund. In about 3 months I've gotten back about 2% of my investment, but it's real money successfully withdrawn from the site. It's a hopeful sign because if I was made whole it would be absolutely life changing. Good for you. I assume you invested a lot here since those whale investors is the priority of the refund. I just hope that they continue the refund process until 100% complete for whatever they are using right now to generate profit.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Is this the same betking that operate in Nigeria and known majorly for soccer bet just like bet9ja. Well I never knew they had an ICO far back in the time of ICO and to see an old account as of that of legendary handling their presence here means they have been around. Anyway, I remember those days there were lots of exit scam and it is nice seeing this site trying to fulfill some promises made in the past and I hope they sincerely do that.My suggestion therefore is to send email messages to accounts that registered with them rather than relying on the this thread alone.

comments.author: AbuBhakar

This is Betking.io while Betking.com is the one you are describing as popular casino in Nigeria which is still active until now.I believe the owner of this casino wants to inform forum user that doesn't check email frequently simce emails sometimes being flood by junk email.

comments.body: Quote from: AbuBhakar on September 17, 2023, 05:12:31 PMQuote from: Gozie51 on September 17, 2023, 01:45:06 PMIs this the same betking that operate in Nigeria and known majorly for soccer bet just like bet9ja. They have ran an ICO in 2017 on this forum where they have raised around $6 million from the investors. They have scammed all those investors and now they are back again only to scam more members. Be aware of them and check the flags against them. I haven't heard about Betking.com but they might be different from Betking.io and that's why everyone should be careful.

It doesn’t accept deposits and also this thread is for refund and not an advertisement to attract players. We are already off-topic here.

Still understandable since today is weekends and he fulfilled his promise that he will contact me yesterday. I'm positive that this refund will be successful.I wish you luck that you get your refund if they really have the plan to reopen there's a lot of work to be done and they have to reach out to every one of the investors and also those who red tag them.It is not an easy job but if they show dedication and are transparent and honest on rebuilding their reputation they can do it but it's not going to be easy, people will still doubt them and it will take time, but they have done the right now.Hopefully, we'll get more updates on refunding their investors.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: AbuBhakar on September 18, 2023, 11:46:51 AMAlso, There’s no sense on giving warning about this casino since Betkng.io is not operational anymore. It doesn’t accept deposits and also this thread is for refund and not an advertisement to attract players. We are already off-topic here. It's still needed to give warnings because such businesses can play the trick once again with the victims who were affected by the ICO fraud that Betking.io did with them. I know that the title of the thread is for refunding and they said that they have refunded $38k but still that amount is nothing against $6 million. I'm not accusing them because if they are going to refund the users then that's going to help them regain some trust. I hope Eternad and others will get their money refunded by Betking.io and if they does then that's something unbelievable, and surely it will be a hard thing for them to refund each investors but if they successfully does that then they may gain some trust once again.

comments.author: BetKing.io
comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on September 18, 2023, 08:15:37 PMQuote from: AbuBhakar on September 18, 2023, 11:46:51 AMAlso, There’s no sense on giving warning about this casino since Betkng.io is not operational anymore. It doesn’t accept deposits and also this thread is for refund and not an advertisement to attract players. We are already off-topic here. It's still needed to give warnings because such businesses can play the trick once again with the victims who were affected by the ICO fraud that Betking.io did with them. I know that the title of the thread is for refunding and they said that they have refunded $38k but still that amount is nothing against $6 million. I'm not accusing them because if they are going to refund the users then that's going to help them regain some trust. I hope Eternad and others will get their money refunded by Betking.io and if they does then that's something unbelievable, and surely it will be a hard thing for them to refund each investors but if they successfully does that then they may gain some trust once again.Just to correct a common repeated mistake in your post. The ICO did raise $6 million.$1 million of that investment was money I put in myself. I'm not looking to make that back.$5 million came from other investors. Most of it was profit they had made from BetKing pre ICO, when we had a crowdfunded bankroll.The amount we are trying to refund is over $2 million. That shows the initial investors actually received almost $3 million back before we closed..Almost all of those investors made a profit due to buying with 25% discount in the ICO. The tokens were bought back by BetKing at a higher price.The refunds are for the unfortunate investors who never sold any tokens in buybacks or received any other form of refunds.$2 million is a huge amount to be refunding out of my own pocket but it's certainly more probable than refunding $6 million, that people commonly mistake the number to be.Last thing. There is no desire for me to open BetKing at all. It is currently closed for deposits.The only way I would re-open it is if, and only if, there was a chance that a good portion of old players would return and it had a high chance of being able to make profit that could speed up investor refunds. This is obviously unlikely.If we did open and the site made enough to refund investors, I would close it the next day. I have no interest in making money from BetKing personally.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: This is the first time I am seen this in the forum and the casino me looks familiar, though I have not participated in their games before the name sound familiar. I just checked the google search engine to confirm the one I know. The domain names are not the same but they are similar. The one I know is betking.com https://mlite.betking.com/en/sports. Well Op I can see that you have a heavy negative tags in your profile and I believe for your to clear that negative trust is not hard if really you have truly repented and clear all refunds. Because it was users that reported you to be tagged and the same users will still report you to be a good casino that has repaid all the token. So the genuineness of what you are saying is best. We are all human, we have feelings what you did to them hurt them and now that you are back to refund the token to them, it is a good move you have taken, let it be legit. When you have re-funded all the money back to the owners and do the right thing then the forum will still give you trust back. The real trust is from the mind. So go and sin no more.
